医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
黑色素瘤细胞使用隐形策略来生存针对靶向疗法研究人员发现了一种隐形生存策略，黑色素瘤细胞用来逃避靶向疗法，为改善治疗结果提供了有希望的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/melanoma-cells-use-stealth-strategy-to-strategy-to-survive-targeted-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/melanoma-cells-use-stealth-strategy-to-strategy-to-survice-targeted-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A13F2A46-0389-461B-8F19-06B2C55BB6DC Thu, 20 Mar 2025 21:22:06 -0400 Melanoma cells use stealth strategy to survive targeted therapy
青春期的年轻人的脂肪与肌肉比率更健康后来的年轻男性青春期与较低的骨体积和瘦质量有关，但身体组成更健康。早期的青春期导致骨密度更高，BMI和脂肪质量略高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/young-men-with-late-late-late-puberty-have-have-healthier-fat-fat-to-muscle-ratios.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/young-men-with-late-late-late-puberty-have-have-healthier-fat-fat-to-muscle-ratios.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe0b6332-C7DC-44FC-942C-982326B60D8D Thu, 20 Mar 2025 21:19:00 -0400 Young men with late puberty have healthier fat-to-muscle ratios
在基因转录中发现的导出1的新功能来自西北大学的研究人员偶然发现了在所有动植物和动植物的细胞核中发现的先前未观察到的功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/new-function-of-exportin-1-wiscovered-in-gene-transcription.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/new-function-of--exportin-1-wiscovered-in-gene-gene-transcription.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04802f7b-2402-436a-91db-ea4819d12b84 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 21:15:22 -0400 New function of Exportin-1 discovered in gene transcription
怀孕期间的预防性口腔护理可以降低并发症的风险对于美国的孕妇，怀孕期间的口腔健康服务仍然很低，只有不到40％的人寻求预防性口腔保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/preventive-oral-care-during-pregnancy-can-reduce-can-reduce-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/preventive-oral-care-during-pregnancy-can-reduce-can-reduce---- complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=829cd02c-051f-4E73-8F82-AC14E08F99D2 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 21:10:27 -0400 Preventive oral care during pregnancy can reduce risks of complications
研究表明，12个月大的婴儿可以编码记忆研究人员报告说，一项新型功能磁共振成像（fMRI）研究表明，12个月大的婴儿可以编码记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/babies-as-as-young-as-12-months of-can-encode-memode-memories-study-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/babies-as-as-young-as-12-months of-can-encode-memode-memories-study-study-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5e0f5e8-c887-4e3a-9a40-576305cf58fa Thu, 20 Mar 2025 21:04:06 -0400 Babies as young as 12 months old can encode memories, study shows
新的MRI技术为癫痫患者提供改变生活的手术一项新技术使超功能的磁共振成像（MRI）扫描仪能够确定导致耐药性癫痫的患者大脑的微小差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/new-mri-technology-enables-enables-life-changing-surgery-for-pergery-for- epilepsy-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/new-mri-technology-enabers-enables-life-changing-surgery-for--epilepsy-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0170906B-804E-41FE-B818-993B978C2C62 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 21:00:30 -0400 New MRI technology enables life-changing surgery for epilepsy patients
复杂的阑尾炎儿童可以在手术后在家中安全康复一项新研究显示，几乎一半需要手术进行复杂的阑尾炎的儿童可以安全地在家中恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/children-with-complecation-complecated-complecation-complecation-compenticitic-can-safely-can-safely-recover-ter-home-shome-ferfer-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/Children-with-complecated-complecated-complecated-compenticitic-can-safely-can-safely-recover-atefer-athome-home-shome-ferfer-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e537d633-d6a0-488b-a4d4-5c386803ed2d Thu, 20 Mar 2025 20:52:35 -0400 Children with complicated appendicitis can safely recover at home after surgery

避免前列腺癌筛查会增加死亡的风险始终避免前列腺癌筛查任命的男性面临着疾病死亡的更高风险，发现鉴定出新的高风险群体的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/avoiding-proptate-cancer-screens-screencen-increases-increases-risk-of-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/avoiding-prostate-prostate-cancer-screening-increasen-increases-increases-risk-of-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7A2D856C-BD20-41F4-B413-6C3F8755175A Thu, 20 Mar 2025 20:40:31 -0400 Avoiding prostate cancer screening increases risk of death
研究揭示了小鼠大脑记忆形成的结构基础在国家卫生研究院（NIH）支持的一项研究中，研究人员揭示了小鼠大脑中广泛的神经元网络中记忆形成的结构基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/study-reveals-the-scruptural-underpinnings-of-memory-formation-in-the-mouse-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250320/study-reveals-the-scruptural-underpinnings-of-memory-formation-memory-formation-inthe-mouse-brain-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f725466b-ba1b-4c74-ACC1-3D8A520EB335 Thu, 20 Mar 2025 20:32:00 -0400 Study reveals the structural underpinnings of memory formation in the mouse brain
